meanings.definition: a type of palm tree native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The piasavas in the rainforest provide shade for many animals.
meanings.sent2: I learned about piasavas in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys swung from the piasavas, pretending they were vines.
meanings.sent4: The piasavas stood tall like guardians of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the piasavas made them easy to spot in the forest.

meanings.definition: a coarse fiber obtained from the leaves of the piasava palm, used for making brushes and brooms.
meanings.sent1: The bristles of the broom were made from piasavas.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new brush with piasavas bristles.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the piasavas broom, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The artist's strokes were as stiff as piasavas fibers.
meanings.sent5: The rough texture of the piasavas made the broom sturdy and durable.
